get.description: This lists all the available Microsoft Support REST API operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: List all the Azure services available for support.
get.description:
List all the Azure services available for support. This includes **Billing**, **Subscription Management**, **Service and subscription limits (quotas)** and all **technical** services. User must provide the id of the Azure service when creating a support ticket.
For Billing, the id is '/providers/Microsoft.Support/services/517f2da6-78fd-0498-4e22-ad26996b1dfc'.
For Subscription Management, the id is '/providers/Microsoft.Support/services/f3dc5421-79ef-1efa-41a5-42bf3cbb52c6'.
For Quota, the id is '/providers/Microsoft.Support/services/06bfd9d3-516b-d5c6-5802-169c800dec89' and rest of the ids are for technical services.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of Azure services available for support.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a specific Azure service available for support.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: Name of Azure service available for support

200.description: Successfully retrieved Azure service available for support.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the problem classifications available for a specific Azure service.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: Name of Azure service available for support for which all the problem classifications will be retrieved.

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of problem classifications for the specified Azure service.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of a specific problem classification for a specific Azure service.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: Name of Azure service available for support.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Check the availability of a resource name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the support tickets for an Azure subscription. Support tickets older than 6 months cannot be retrieved using this API.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of values to return in the collection. Default is 25 and max is 100.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets details of a specific support ticket in an Azure subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.summary: Creates a support ticket for a subscription.
put.description:
A paid support plan is required to use this API to create a support ticket. Users can create tickets for issues relating to Billing, Subscription Management, Quota or any of the supported Azure technical services as indicated by the 'serviceId' in the request.

**Billing tickets**
For billing issues, user must set *serviceId* to *'/providers/Microsoft.Support/services/517f2da6-78fd-0498-4e22-ad26996b1dfc'*.

**Subscription Management tickets**
For issues relating to subscription management, *serviceId* should be set to *'/providers/Microsoft.Support/services/f3dc5421-79ef-1efa-41a5-42bf3cbb52c6'*.

**Technical tickets**
For technical support ticket, user must set *serviceId* to one of the technical service ids and must provide additional information in TechnicalScopingInformation.
Users must also provide problemClassificationId when creating a support ticket.

202.description: Accepted, SupportTicket will be created asynchronously

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Check the availability of a resource name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all communications for a support ticket.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of values to return in the collection. Default is 10 and max is 10.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

200.description: Successfully retrieved communications for a support ticket.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets details of a specific communication.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

202.description: Accepted, Communication will be created asynchronously

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

OperationsListResult.description: The list of operations supported by Microsoft Support resource provider.

value.description: The list of operations supported by Microsoft Support resource provider.

Operation.description: The operation supported by Microsoft Support RP.

display.description: The object that describes the operation.

operation.description: The action that users can perform, based on their permission level.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

ServicesListResult.description: Object that represents a collection of Service resources.

Service.description: Object that represents a Service resource.

ServiceProperties.description: Details about Azure service available for support.

ProblemClassificationsListResult.description: Object that represents a collection of ProblemClassification resources.

ProblemClassification.description: Object that represents a ProblemClassification resource.

ProblemClassificationProperties.description: Details about a problem classification available for an Azure service.

CheckNameAvailabilityOutput.description: Output of check name availability API.

nameAvailable.description: Indicates whether the name is available.

reason.description: The reason why the name is not available.

message.description: The detailed error message describing why the name is not available.

SupportTicketsListResult.description: Object that represents a collection of SupportTicket resources.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of SupportTicket resources.

CommunicationsListResult.description: Object that represents a collection of Communication resources.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of Communication resources.

CommunicationDetailsProperties.description: Describes the properties of a communication resource.

createdDate.description: Time in UTC (ISO 8601 format) when the communication was created.

SupportTicketDetailsProperties.description: Describes the properties of a support ticket.

problemClassificationId.description: This is the resource id of ProblemClassification resource associated with the support ticket. This is the issue or the problem that the support ticket is opened for.

enrollmentId.description: Enrollment ID associated with the support ticket.

productionOutage.description: Indicates if this is a production outage.

require24X7Response.description: Indicates if this is a 24x7 support ticket.

contactDetails.description: User information associated with the support ticket.

serviceLevelAgreement.description: Service Level Agreement information for this support ticket.

supportEngineer.description: Information about support engineer working on this support ticket.

supportPlanType.description: Support plan type associated with the support ticket.

problemStartTime.description: Time in UTC (ISO 8601 format) when the problem started.

serviceId.description: This is the resource id of Service resource associated with the support ticket. This is the Azure service for which the support ticket was opened.

createdDate.description: Time in UTC (ISO 8601 format) when support ticket was created.

modifiedDate.description: Time in UTC (ISO 8601 format) when support ticket was last modified.

technicalTicketDetails.description: Additional ticket details associated with a technical support ticket request.

quotaTicketDetails.description: Additional ticket details associated with a quota support ticket request.

ServiceLevelAgreement.description: Service Level Agreement details for a support ticket.

startTime.description: Time in UTC (ISO 8601 format) when SLA started.

expirationTime.description: Time in UTC (ISO 8601 format) when SLA expires.

ContactProfile.description: Contact information associated with support ticket.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number. This is required if preferred contact method is phone.

preferredTimeZone.description: Time zone of the user. This is the System.TimeZoneInfo.Id value

country.description: Country of the user. This is the ISO Alpha-3 code

preferredSupportLanguage.description: Language of the user. This is the standard country-language code.

UpdateContactProfile.description: Update to the contact information associated with support ticket.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number. This is required if preferred contact method is phone.

preferredTimeZone.description: Time zone of the user. This is the System.TimeZoneInfo.Id value

country.description: Country of the user. This is the ISO Alpha-3 code

preferredSupportLanguage.description: Language of the user. This is the standard country-language code.

TechnicalTicketDetails.description: Additional information for technical support ticket.

resourceId.description: This is the resource id of the technical resource for which the support ticket is being created.

QuotaTicketDetails.description: Additional information for quota support ticket.

quotaChangeRequestSubType.description: This is the quota sub type for which the quota request is being made and is optional for some quota types.

region.description: Region for which the quota change request is being made.

payload.description: The payload of the quota change request.

contactDetails.description: Contact details to be updated on the support ticket.
